fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

$block: An individual message in a conversation. Conversation tracking is a feature available to paid accounts that lets you view replies to your campaigns in your Mailchimp account.

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**conversation_id**: A string that identifies this message's conversation
**from_email**: A label representing the email of the sender of this message
**from_label**: A label representing the sender of this message
**id**: A string that uniquely identifies this message
**message**: The plain-text content of the message
**read**: Whether this message has been marked as read
**timestamp**: The date and time the message was either sent or received in ISO 8601 format.

**status**: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
